ESRS E1 paragraph AR 25 requires that when setting new targets the undertaking select a recent
base year that does not precede the first reporting year of the new target period by more than
three years. For example, for 2030 as the target year and a target period between 2025 and 2030,
the base year shall be selected from the period between 2022 and 2025. For the following five-
